TopicTitle: How did it take me MONTHS to realise you can navigate the KSC menu?!

Articles.Content:
You know that menu where you can select whether to goto the SPH or the VAB etc.

I just learned, after like so many months of play that you can navigate it by using WASD and your RMB to look around, and mousewheel to zoom in/out.

Just for those who wanted to know.
